mapper.insert: insert into room (id, roomID, type, floor, status, user, describe, more) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roomID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{floor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{more,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update room set roomID = #{roomID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, floor = #{floor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user = #{user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, describe = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, more = #{more,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, roomID, type, floor, status, user, describe, more from room
